snippet: The rowhouse in Park Slope, Brooklyn, that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio is leaving and Gracie Mansion, the Upper East Side residence he is about to inhabit, are quite different.
abstract: Park Slope, Brooklyn, rowhouse that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio is leaving for Gracie Mansion, on Manhattan's Upper East Side, are separated by all of eight miles, but represent quite different perspectives on life in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The rowhouse in Park Slope, Brooklyn, that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio is leaving and Gracie Mansion, the Upper East Side residence he is about to inhabit, are quite different.

headline.main: De Blasio on the Move: Comparing 2 Houses
